mapper.select: SELECT distinct A.RIC as RIC,A.shares_name as sharesName,A.class_id as classId,A.shares_price AS sharesPrice, A.currency_id AS currencyId,A.shares_num AS sharesNum,A.trade_limit AS tradeLimit,A.shares_flag as sharesFlag FROM shares as A where A.RIC = #{RIC};
mapper.update: update shares set shares_num = #{param2} where RIC = #{param1};
